Which part controls the whole body?

Which part of the body helps us think?
Which part controls the whole body?
What is the function of the brain?
questions.answer: The brain controls all body activities.

questions.question: What does the heart do?
questions.answer: The heart pumps blood throughout the body.

questions.question: What is the function of lungs?
What is digestion?
questions.answer: Digestion breaks food into simple forms.

questions.question: What is respiration?
questions.answer: Breathing in oxygen and breathing out carbon dioxide.

questions.question: What does the liver do?
questions.answer: It helps digestion and removes toxins.

questions.question: Why is heart called a pump?
Why should we eat healthy food?
Why should we care for body?
Why should we take care of internal organs?
questions.answer: Internal organs help the body function properly.
